title: Drawing, 1892
medium: Brush and watercolor, white gouache, graphite on gray wove paper
markings: Verso: Stamped in black ink, lower left: Museum for the Arts of Decoration Cooper Union [Lugt 457e]
inscribed:
Recto: Inscribed in graphite, upper edge: Alpine Pass at Cascade Twin Lakes, Colorado; in graphite at lower left: (77)    54
Verso: Inscribed pen and black ink, upper left: no. 112
description:
Recto: a trail in the foreground opens to a view of a valley with a rushing stream, leading to mountains in the distance.
Verso: profile outlines of mountain.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, 1892.
1892. Brush and watercolor, white gouache, graphite on gray wove paper. Gift of Thomas Moran. 1917-17-71.
